verbose_text: In conclusion, stabilization of the hinge loop in RR1 by T577P and stabilization and neutralization of a region of instability in the GP1-GP2 interface by K588F dramatically increases the yield of filovirus prefusion GP trimers.
evidence: RR1 by T577P and stabilization and neutralization of a region of instability in the GP1-GP2 interface by K588F dramatically increases the yield of filovirus prefusion GP
